Name: Miami Sunset Drive
About the game: miami sunset drive - Eternal sunset, wind from the coast in your face and synthwave driving your favorite car - that's what awaits you in this variation of the endless runner! Instead of jumping over enemies - go around them in style! Maneuver your car around slower fellow travelers and collect coins as you try to get as far as possible in this never-ending adventure to a driving soundtrack. How far can you get? Peculiarities: - Nice graphics by Hukkilo - Nice soundtrack by DavidKBD
